title: New: SALES – Vow
body:
**Sales** are the sound of summer 2014.

It’s been decided. They’re one of those acts who manage to perfectly fit the vocal sound, with that of the guitars, and new track, _Vow_, is further proof of their potential to release one of the albums of the year.

excerpt.short: Sales are the sound of summer 2014.
